es.upv.indigodc.service

Class OrchestratorConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.upv.indigodc.service.OrchestratorConnector

  • public class OrchestratorConnector
extends java.lang.Object
    Manage and do the calls to the REST API exposed by the IndigoDC Orchestrator; Connect to the authorization system to obtain a token for the calls to the IndigoDC Orchestrator

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  OrchestratorConnector.AccessToken
      Store the token information received after a successful call to the user authorization service from DEEP

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String WS_PATH_DEPLOYMENTS
      Web service path for deployments operations; It is appended to the orchestrator endpoint

    • Constructor Summary

      OrchestratorConnector()

      • callDeploy

        public OrchestratorResponse callDeploy(CloudConfiguration cloudConfiguration,
                                       java.lang.String userName,
                                       java.lang.String userPassword,
                                       java.lang.String yamlTopology)
                                throws java.io.IOException,
                                       java.lang.NoSuchFieldException,
                                       OrchestratorIAMException
        Deploy an alien 4 cloud topology It is already adapted to the normative TOSCA supported by the Orchestrator
        Parameters:
        cloudConfiguration - The configuration used for the plugin instance
        yamlTopology - The actual topology accepted by the orchestrator. It is a string formated and packed for the orchestrator e.g. new lines are replaced with their representation of '\n'.
        Returns:
        The orchestrator REST response to this call
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.NoSuchFieldException
        OrchestratorIAMException

      • callDeploymentStatus

        public OrchestratorResponse callDeploymentStatus(CloudConfiguration cloudConfiguration,
                                                 java.lang.String userName,
                                                 java.lang.String userPassword,
                                                 java.lang.String deploymentId)
                                          throws java.io.IOException,
                                                 java.lang.NoSuchFieldException,
                                                 OrchestratorIAMException
        Get the status of a deployment with a given deployment ID
        Parameters:
        cloudConfiguration - The configuration used for the plugin instance
        deploymentId - The id of the deployment we need the information for
        Returns:
        The orchestrator REST response to this call
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.NoSuchFieldException
        OrchestratorIAMException

      • callUndeploy

        public OrchestratorResponse callUndeploy(CloudConfiguration cloudConfiguration,
                                         java.lang.String userName,
                                         java.lang.String userPassword,
                                         java.lang.String deploymentId)
                                  throws java.io.IOException,
                                         java.lang.NoSuchFieldException,
                                         OrchestratorIAMException
        Invoke the undeploy REST API for a given deployment ID
        Parameters:
        cloudConfiguration - The configuration used for the plugin instance
        deploymentId - The id of the deployment we need to undeploy
        Returns:
        The orchestrator REST response to this call
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.NoSuchFieldException
        OrchestratorIAMException

      • restCall

        public OrchestratorResponse restCall(java.net.URL requestURL,
                                     java.lang.String postData,
                                     java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> headers,
                                     boolean isSecured,
                                     javax.net.ssl.SSLContext sslContext,
                                     HttpMethod requestType)
                              throws java.io.IOException,
                                     java.lang.NoSuchFieldException,
                                     OrchestratorIAMException
        General method that actually performs the calls of the DEEP Orchestrator and authorization endpoints It can connect to both HTTPS and HTTP servers
        Parameters:
        requestURL - The endpoint that handles the call
        postData - Data to be sent to the endpoint. It can be null
        headers - The headers of the call made on the endpoint
        isSecured - HTTPS or HTTP protocols
        sslContext - The certificate handler
        requestType - one of the following values: OrchestratorConnector.{POST, GET, DELETE, PUT}
        Returns:
        The orchestrator REST response to this call
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.NoSuchFieldException
        OrchestratorIAMException

      • getResponse

        protected java.lang.StringBuilder getResponse(java.io.InputStream is)
                                       throws java.io.IOException
        Obtain the response from the DEEP endpoint once a successful HTTP/HTTPS connection is established
        Parameters:
        is - The stream that contains the response from the endpoint
        Returns:
        The full response from the DEEP endpoint
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
